text: @NYGovCuomo When will Govt sue Pharma Company that hold the Patent and a Vaccine for Covid19? They pushout viruses and then force the Govt to vaccinate, making laws and making billions. This time it’s many Murdered so, they should be sued by the world and by all who have lost loved ones.
